public class EditEventActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity implements android.app.TimePickerDialog.OnTimeSetListener, android.app.DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener
Activity to edit and event or event poster/details

    • saveEventDetails

      private void saveEventDetails()
      Saves the details of an event by validating inputs, handling image upload and updating the event in the database.

    • updateEvent

      private void updateEvent(String firebaseID, String title, String cost, long startDateTime, long endDateTime, String description, int numParticipantsCount, @Nullable android.util.Pair<String,String> urlAndID, long selectionDate, @Nullable Integer entrantLimit, String duration, boolean geolocationOn, boolean replacementDrawOn)
      Updates an existing event with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      firebaseID - The Firebase ID of the event to be updated.
      title - The title of the event.
      cost - The cost of the event.
      startDateTime - The start date and time of the event (in milliseconds).
      endDateTime - The end date and time of the event (in milliseconds).
      description - A brief description of the event.
      numParticipantsCount - The number of participants for the event.
      urlAndID - A Pair containing the URL for the event's poster image and its ID (optional).
      selectionDate - The date of the selection process (in milliseconds).
      entrantLimit - The maximum number of entrants (can be null if no limit).
      duration - The duration of the event.
      geolocationOn - Indicates whether geolocation is enabled for the event.
      replacementDrawOn - Indicates whether a replacement draw is enabled for the event.

    • convertDateToMS

      private long convertDateToMS(String date, String time)
      This method is used to convert the date in milliseconds
      Parameters:
      date - in form DD-MM-77
      time - in form HH:MM
      Returns:
      the date in ms

    • getEndDateTimeFromDuration

      private String getEndDateTimeFromDuration(String startDate, String startTime, String duration)
      Calculates the end date and time by adding the specified duration to the start date and time.
      Parameters:
      startDate - The start date in "dd-MM-yyyy" format.
      startTime - The start time in "HH:mm" format.
      duration - The duration to be added in "HH:mm" format.
      Returns:
      The calculated end date and time as a string in "dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm" format.

    • onTimeSet

      public void onTimeSet(android.widget.TimePicker view, int hourOfDay, int minute)
      Called when the organizer sets the time on a time picker.
      Specified by:
      onTimeSet in interface android.app.TimePickerDialog.OnTimeSetListener
      Parameters:
      view - The TimePicker view where the organizer selects the time.
      hourOfDay - The hour of the day in 24-hour format (0-23).
      minute - The minute

    • onDateSet

      public void onDateSet(android.widget.DatePicker view, int year, int month, int dayOfMonth)
      Called when the organizer sets the date on a date picker.
      Specified by:
      onDateSet in interface android.app.DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener
      Parameters:
      view - The DatePicker view where the user selects the date.
      year - The year selected
      month - The month selected (e.g - January is 0, February is 1).
      dayOfMonth - The day of the month selected by the organizer.
